/*Imports section, do not touch*/import axios from'axios';/*This constant controlls the amount of books or results we want to show up
const LIMIT = "&maxResults=20";*/export var searchGoogleBooks=function searchGoogleBooks(title){return axios.get('https://www.googleapis.com/books/v1/volumes'+title);};export var fetchSavedBooks=function fetchSavedBooks(){return axios.get('/api/books');};export var saveBook=function saveBook(bookData){return axios.post('/api/books',bookData);};export var deleteBook=function deleteBook(bookId){return axios.delete("/api/books/".concat(bookId));};export default{saveBook:saveBook,fetchSavedBooks:fetchSavedBooks,deleteBook:deleteBook,searchGoogleBooks:searchGoogleBooks};
